name: author_bot
description: True if the given author is identified as a bot.

name: author_domain
description: Author domain from Email.

name: author_gender
description: Author gender.

name: author_id
description: Author Id from SortingHat.

name: author_multi_org_names
description: List of the author organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: author_name
description: Author name.

name: author_org_name
description: Author organization name from SortingHat profile.

name: author_user_name
description: Author username for the platform

name: author_uuid
description: Author UUID from SortingHat.

name: fromUser_bot
description: True if the given sender is identified as a bot.

name: fromUser_domain
description: Sender domain from Email.

name: fromUser_gender
description: Author gender.

name: fromUser_id
description: Sender Id from SortingHat.

name: fromUser_multi_org_names
description: List of the sender organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: fromUser_name
description: Sender name.

name: fromUser_org_name
description: Sender organization name from SortingHat profile.

name: fromUser_user_name
description: Sender username for the platform

name: fromUser_uuid
description: Sender UUID from SortingHat.

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Message date (when the original author sent the message).

name: id
description: Message sender user ID for gitter.

name: is_gitter_message
description: True if the item is a Gitter message.

name: issues
description: List of issues mentioned in the message, Empty if no issues were mentioned.

name: mentioned
description: List of users mentioned in the message, Empty if no user is mentioned.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the item was enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in RAW index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated in its original data source.

name: origin
description: Original URL where the room was retrieved from.

name: project_1
description: Project (if more than one level is allowed in project hierarchy)

name: project
description: Project.

name: readBy
description: Count of users who have read the message

name: repository_labels
description: Custom repository labels defined by the user.

name: tag
description: Perceval tag.

name: text_analyzed
description: Message body in plain text.

name: tz
description: Time of the day the message was sent.

name: unread
description: True if the message is unread by user, False if read.

name: url_hostname
description: List of URL hostnames of the URL(s) mentioned in the message.

name: uuid
description: Perceval UUID.
